name: Water Elemental Myrmidon
languages: one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Freezing Strikes {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10 damage) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.
